DOC.brief_summary: It well establish assess functionality filter bleb intraocular pressure ( IOP ) , either absolute value percent reduction , need additional antiglaucoma drug . It also possible evaluate appearance bleb clinical score , e.g . `` Wuerzburg bleb classification score '' ( WBCS ) . Using colour photograph filter bleb evaluate accord WBCS two different examiner , different level clinical experience . WBCS = 1 indicates poor bleb appearance , WBCS = 15 indicates optimal bleb appearance . At time , clinical finding like intraocular pressure , best correct visual acuity , slit lamp biomicroscopy medical history take another examiner . - Trial surgical intervention
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Filtering Blebs Using `` Wuerzburg Bleb Classification Score '' Compared Other Clinical Findings , e.g . Intraocular Pressure ( IOP )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Diagnosis glaucoma , status post trabeculectomy Exclusion criterion : age < 18 Jahre , optic neuropathy glaucoma
